revision.text: <noinclude> {{note|This page is meant to be included into other pages that describe {{class|BaseStatusBar}} functions, such as [[DrawImage (BaseStatusBar)|DrawImage()]] using the '''<nowiki>{{: BaseStatusBar SCREEN flags}}</nowiki>''' syntax. (This note will not be included.)}} </noinclude>:The DI_SCREEN* flags will change the origin point of the coordinates where the element is drawn (essentially, moving where the {{c|(0, 0)}} point is located. :*{{c|DI_SCREEN_LEFT_TOP}} - The coordinates begin at the top left corner of the screen :*{{c|DI_SCREEN_CENTER_TOP}} - The coordinates begin at the top center of the screen :*{{c|DI_SCREEN_RIGHT_TOP}} - The coordinates begin at the top right corner of the screen :*{{c|DI_SCREEN_LEFT_CENTER}} - The coordinates begin at the center left side of the screen :*{{c|DI_SCREEN_CENTER}} - The coordinates begin at the center of the screen :*{{c|DI_SCREEN_RIGHT_CENTER}} - The coordinates begin at the center right side of the screen :*{{c|DI_SCREEN_LEFT_BOTTOM}} - The coordinates begin at the bottom left corner of the screen :*{{c|DI_SCREEN_CENTER_BOTTOM}} - The coordinates begin at the bottom center of the screen :*{{c|DI_SCREEN_RIGHT_BOTTOM}} - The coordinates begin at the bottom right corner of the screen :Note, these flags do not change the orientation of coordinates. Regardless of where the element is drawn, positive X moves it to the right, positive Y moves it down. :More flags are defined in the [https://github.com/ZDoom/gzdoom/blob/e7a79b0d448759b8cfe51e325f8a0b36cf340041/wadsrc/static/zscript/engine/ui/statusbar/statusbarcore.zs#L27 StatusBarCore] class, but they're mostly aliases of the above ones.<noinclude>[[Category:Include templates]]</noinclude>
